/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, adding a touch of nature to the concrete jungle. Cars and bicycles are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the daily hustle and bustle of city dwellers. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day, which illuminates the scene with bright, natural light.
